Uses of Interface
org.gephi.utils.progress.ProgressTicket

  • Packages that use ProgressTicket 
    Package Description
    org.gephi.utils.longtask.spi
    LongTask adds functionalities to any class that wants to be progressable and cancellable.
    org.gephi.utils.progress
    Progress support for long tasks execution.

    • Uses of ProgressTicket in org.gephi.utils.longtask.spi

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LongTask.setProgressTicket(ProgressTicket progressTicket)
      Set the progress ticket for the long task.
